amendment.description: To require the President to provide to Congress a copy of the Scowcroft Commission report on improving the capabilities of the United States intelligence community.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3626 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 45. Record Vote Number: 180.

Amendment SA 3626 proposed by Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S9110-9112; text: CR S9111) To require the President to provide to Congress a copy of the Scowcroft Commission report on improving the capabilities of the United States intelligence community.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3626 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 45. Record Vote Number: 180.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3626 proposed by Senator Kennedy.
